(&촀\0You know what's kinda fun in a
weird way? 
\0(%촀\0Goin' up against the
time limit in the Fishing Tourney.
(1촀\0I guess it just gets my competitive
juices flowin'n\0\0\0\0Hearin' that reel sizzle as I haul in
another one at the last secondn

(9촀\0One thing you gotta remember
about the Fishing Tourney
\0 is
that it ain't free!
(%촀\0So grab some Bells before you
go talk to \0C.J.\0￿, unless you wanna
walk away disappointed.

(&촀\0You wanna know the secret to doin'
well in the Fishing Tourney?\0\0(촀\0You gotta chase every shadow!
\0
Toss that lure! 
\0(6촀\0There's no time
for thinkin' or reflectin'!

(촀\0Sure are a lotta folks out fishin'
todayn\0\0 (촀\0OH! 
\0I forgot about
the tourney!
(촀\0Ah, well. 
\0If some of us stay home
and twiddle our thumbs, that gives
the fish a fightin' chance, I suppose.

(촀\0Great weather for fishin', eh?\0\0(&촀\0You sure you wanna stand around
yakkin' with me instead of catchin'
fish right now?
